    Enum Description
    AccountFlag

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AccountRequiresMemoException
    AccountRequiresMemoException is thrown when a transaction is trying to submit an operation to an account which requires a memo.
    AssetCodeLengthInvalidException
    Indicates that asset code is not valid for a specified asset class
    FormatException
    Indicates that there was a problem decoding strkey encoded string.
    InvalidSep10ChallengeException
    If the SEP-0010 validation fails, the exception will be thrown.
    MemoTooLongException
    Indicates that value passed to Memo
    NetworkMismatchException  
    NoNetworkSelectedException
    Indicates that no network was selected.
    NotEnoughSignaturesException
    Indicates that the object that has to be signed has not enough signatures.
